Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: downloadBufferLimit
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: How much data is downloaded in memory before stored on a file. Defaults to 15.MB.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: readDataLimit
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: How much data is allowed to be read in memory at a time. Defaults to 10.MB.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: shouldVerifyDownloadedFileSize
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: Flag for deciding whether an error should be thrown when URLResponse’s expectedContentLength is not equal with the downloaded media file bytes count. Defaults to false.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: minimumExpectedFileSize
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: If set greater than 0, the set value with be compared with the downloaded media size. If the size of the downloaded media is lower, an error will be thrown. Useful when expectedContentLength is unavailable.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: shouldCheckAvailableDiskSpaceBeforeCaching
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: Flag for deciding whether an NSFileWriteOutOfSpaceError should be thrown when there is not enough available disk space left for caching the entire media file. Defaults to true.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: default
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: The default configuration instance used for CachingPlayerItem instances.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: downloadBufferLimit
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: How much data is downloaded in memory before stored on a file.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: readDataLimit
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: How much data is allowed to be read in memory at a time.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: shouldVerifyDownloadedFileSize
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: Flag for deciding whether an error should be thrown when URLResponse’s expectedContentLength is not equal with the downloaded media file bytes count.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: minimumExpectedFileSize
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: If set greater than 0, the set value with be compared with the downloaded media size. If the size of the downloaded media is lower, an error will be thrown. Useful when expectedContentLength is unavailable.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: shouldCheckAvailableDiskSpaceBeforeCaching
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: Flag for deciding whether an NSFileWriteOutOfSpaceError should be thrown when there is not enough available disk space left for caching the entire media file.

Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.name: allowsUncachedSeek
Structs/CachingPlayerItemConfiguration.h.abstract: Allows seeking into uncached parts of the media, downloading data temporarily.

Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.name: playerItem(_:didFinishDownloadingFileAt:)
Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.abstract: Called when the media file is fully downloaded.

Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.name: playerItem(_:didDownloadBytesSoFar:outOf:)
Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.abstract: Called every time a new portion of data is received.

Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.name: playerItemReadyToPlay(_:)
Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.abstract: Called after initial prebuffering is finished, means we are ready to play.

Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.name: playerItemDidFailToPlay(_:withError:)
Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.abstract: Called when the player is unable to play the data/url.

Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.name: playerItemPlaybackStalled(_:)
Protocols/CachingPlayerItemDelegate.html.abstract: Called when the data being downloaded did not arrive in time to continue playback.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.name: passOnObject
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.abstract: Useful for keeping relevant model associated with CachingPlayerItem instance. This is a strong reference, be mindful not to create a retain cycle.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.name: isCaching
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.abstract: Indicates whether media content is currently being cached to disk. Returns false for initializers that don’t support caching.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/c:@M@Cac.name: init(url:)
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/c:@M@Cac.abstract: Play and cache remote media on a local file. saveFilePath is randomly generated. Requires url.pathExtension to not be empty otherwise the player will fail playing.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.name: init(url:avUrlAssetOptions:configuration:)
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.abstract: Play and cache remote media on a local file. saveFilePath is randomly generated. Requires url.pathExtension to not be empty otherwise the player will fail playing.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.name: init(url:customFileExtension:avUrlAssetOptions:configuration:)
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.abstract: Play and cache remote media on a local file. saveFilePath is randomly generated.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/c:@M@Cac.name: init(asset:automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys:)
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/c:@M@Cac.abstract: Play media using an AVAsset. Caching is not supported for this method.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.name: download()
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.abstract: Downloads the media file. Works only with the initializers intended for play and cache.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.name: cancelDownload()
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html#/s:17Cach.abstract: Cancels the download of the media file and deletes the incomplete cached file. Works only with the initializers intended for play and cache.

Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html.name: CachingPlayerItem
Classes/CachingPlayerItem.html.abstract: AVPlayerItem subclass that supports caching while playing.
